<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Flame Wisp](/Spells.aspx?ID=912)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Three faintly glowing wisps of fire float around your head. Each time you hit a creature with a Strike, one of the wisps goes hurtling towards that creature, dealing 1d4 fire damage. If you Cast a Spell with the [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) trait while you have fewer than three wisps, a new wisp appears.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d4.
name: Flame Wisp
